main event: A military pilot observed a bright light moving extremely fast across the sky northwest of Misawa, Japan.
interesting points: The object was described as much brighter than a star,It was estimated to be traveling at a speed approximately 6 times that of a jet aircraft,The sighting lasted for approximately 10 seconds before the object disappeared,There were other reports of similar sightings in the area around this time,Two military personnel observed another object which changed colors and was stationary for about 15 minutes.
witness description: military personnel including a pilot and a radar operator
